name: Black Diamond Mission 55 Backpack - Unisex
description: Black Diamond™ added its mobility-maximizing ergoACTIV suspension system to this tough pack and rigged it for heavy-hauling missions like ice climbing, while still allowing you to strip it down for summer summit bids. The harness delivers ample motion and fluidity for cragging or mountaineering. The supportive frame offers a balance of support and stability that works well for heavy loads over long approaches.Swing Arm shoulder straps and free-flexing ergoACTIV hipbelt for mobility.Strip off the hipbelt padding, floating top lid and removable framesheet for minimalist missions.Thermoformed back panel.Ice tool PickPockets™.Reinforced crampon pouch.Gear loops on hipbelt for racking.Hydration system–compatible.
